dialogue: After Spirit landed on Exus, she headed
straight to the largest city she could find.
She then looked for the person Shandy told her about.
By chance she saw him at a marketplace...
Oi, What do you think you're doing?
How dare you get in the way
of the soldiers of the Empire!
Oh, I'm so sorry, officer. My foot must have slipped.
...just as he was getting into some trouble.
Spirit watched as the man was slowly backing away from the officers.
It was then that Spirt noticed a child cowering behind the man.
She decided to act, to both get the job over with
to give the two a chance to run.
Spirit watched the two run away, and prepared to run away herself.
